imdb.title: Tiger & Bunny
imdb.plot: In a world where superheroes have corporate sponsors and are the stars of their own reality TV show, a new superhero team is born as the veteran hero Wild Tiger is assigned to be partners with rookie Barnaby Brooks Jr.
filmingLocations: New York City, New York, USA

episodes.title: A word to the wise is enough.
episodes.plot: With exciting new heroes gaining popularity and stardom, Tiger and Barnaby are called upon to set a good example.

episodes.title: No one knows the weight of another's burden.
episodes.plot: Now an official superhero, Subaru is eager to make his mark. Feeling desperate, he starts to get ahead of himself.

episodes.title: Suspicion will raise bogies.
episodes.plot: Karina decides to meet with a lonely and sickly fan who says Blue Rose is their favorite superhero. She asks Tiger to come along too.

episodes.title: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
episodes.plot: As the top-ranking superheroes, Fire Emblem and Sky High seem like the perfect buddy team; nevertheless, Nathan has one particular complaint.

episodes.title: Live and let live.
episodes.plot: After getting into an argument with Ivan, Antonio is worried that the Rock Bison and Origami Cyclone partnership won't survive.

episodes.title: Youth should be regarded with respect.
episodes.plot: Lara and Pao-Lin seem to have perfect teamwork, but then Lara's overbearing mother convinces her to see Pao-Lin not as a partner, but as a rival.

episodes.title: Out of the mouths of babes oft times come gems.
episodes.plot: Tiger is delighted - and a little surprised - when his daughter Kaede comes to the city to visit him with her friend.

episodes.title: You can't judge a book by it's cover.
episodes.plot: Subaru gets worried when his partner Thomas is reprimanded for being too violent while apprehending a robber.

episodes.title: Have not thy cloak to make when it begins to rain.
episodes.plot: Tiger bends the rules to try to catch a violent NEXT named Vincent Carl, who left Barnaby badly injured while evading capture.

episodes.title: Pride comes before a fall.
episodes.plot: Fire Emblem and Sky High are found frozen, victims of an attack by a pair of NEXT suspects who've declared war on the city's superheroes.

episodes.title: Every cloud has a silver lining.
episodes.plot: Agnes orders the superheroes to stand down and avoid confrontation with Hugan and Mugan, but soon they're faced with a double threat.

episodes.title: Man's extremity is God's opportunity.
episodes.plot: The remaining superheroes learn Hugan and Mugan's motives, and then put together a plan to defeat the powerful duo.

episodes.title: Constant dropping wears away a stone.
episodes.plot: The superheroes are fighting as hard as they can, but Hugan and Mugan seem impossible to defeat.

episodes.title: March winds and April showers bring forth May flowers.
episodes.plot: Fire Emblem and Sky High win the King of the Buddy Heroes title. Barnaby gets some exciting news, but he has to keep it a secret.

episodes.title: No pain no gain.
episodes.plot: Little is yet known about the NEXT incident, but multiple theories abound. Everyone wants to know what's going on between Kotetsu and Karina.

episodes.title: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
episodes.plot: During a promo shoot, He Is Thomas declares his admiration for L.L. Audun. Then, the heroes are mobilized in response to an attack.

episodes.title: The gods send nuts to those who have no teeth.
episodes.plot: As the "X" phenomenon spreads among NEXT throughout the city, Yuri gathers the heroes and gives them some bad news.

episodes.title: One eyewitness is better than ten hearsays.
episodes.plot: The public has started to turn against all NEXT. Ryan thinks that a NEXT named Gregory Sunshine might be connected to the "X" phenomenon.

episodes.title: You cannot make a crab walk straight.
episodes.plot: Mattia wakes up in the hospital, but he claims to not remember anything that happened. There may be a NEXT with the ability to control other people.

episodes.title: The darkest hour is just before the dawn.
episodes.plot: The Apollon heroes are all told to sign new contracts putting excessive restrictions on what they can do. Yuri shares a story about his father.

episodes.title: Nothing comes of nothing.
episodes.plot: Before the heroes' evacuation, Agnes asks them to gather for one last farewell taping. But she might have something up her sleeve.

episodes.title: Coming events cast their shadows before.
episodes.plot: Gregory powers up the inmates of Abbas Prison and they start rampaging throughout the city. The heroes go rogue to stop them, despite the consequences.

episodes.title: Lookers-on see most of the game.
episodes.plot: Gregory Sunshine has one last inmate to meet; a criminal with incredible powers. Meanwhile, the heroes struggle to neutralize the escaped NEXT.

episodes.title: Union is strength.
episodes.plot: Sigourney Rosicky reveals the reason for her vendetta against Little Aurora. The heroes get an unlikely ally in their fight against L. L. Audun.

episodes.title: Today is not just tomorrow's yesterday.
episodes.plot: A powered up Tiger starts attacking Barnaby, who's left drained of power and vulnerable. Later, Tiger faces a sudden change.

episodes.title: All's Well That Ends Well
episodes.plot: Stern Bild is a metropolitan city where superheroes called NEXT help to maintain peace.

episodes.title: A Good Beginning Makes a Good Ending
episodes.plot: A giant stone statue runs rampant across the city, but Kotetsu and Barnaby are at a disadvantage due to their reluctance to work together. The NEXT behind the statue attack, a young boy with telekinesis, targets an ice rink, where Kotetsu's daughter, Kaede, is performing. Barnaby rescues Kaede whilst Kotetsu, recalling how a NEXT called Legend inspired him to become a hero, manages to convince the boy to use his powers for good when the ice rink starts to collapse with people still inside it.

episodes.title: Many a true word is spoken in jest
episodes.plot: A documentary on Barnaby's personal life is being filmed to help market the new hero's growing popularity.

episodes.title: Fear is often greater than the danger
episodes.plot: Karina Lyle is a teenage girl who loves to sing in front of people. But as Blue Rose, she is forced to assume the role of an ice-wielding superstar on HERO TV.

episodes.title: Go for broke!
episodes.plot: Kotetsu and the other heroes decide to hold a surprise birthday party for Barnaby.

episodes.title: Fire is a good servant but a bad master
episodes.plot: Fire Emblem is suspected of murder after convicted criminals are found burnt to death by powerful flames inside a prison cell.

episodes.title: The Wolf Knows What the Foul Beast Thinks
episodes.plot: Kotetsu criticizes Barnaby for losing his cool and allowing a mysterious NEXT to kill the culprit they were chasing.

episodes.title: There is always a next time
episodes.plot: Stern Bild city does not practice capital punishment, but Lunatic's act of killing criminals begins to win the support of the people, who praise him as an antihero.

episodes.title: Spare the rod and spoil the child
episodes.plot: Huang Pao-Lin, a.k.a. Dragon Kid, is a tomboy who doesn't like to dress in cute girly fashion and even refuses to wear the flower-shaped hair accessory her parents gave her as a gift.

episodes.title: The calm before the storm
episodes.plot: Barnaby has finally tracked down the whereabouts of his parents' killer.

episodes.title: The die is cast
episodes.plot: Ouroboros have taken the people of Stern Bild City hostage in exchange for the release of a convict, the same man that Barnaby was investigating.

episodes.title: Take Heed of the Snake in the Grass
episodes.plot: Origami Cyclone infiltrates the hideout of Ouroboros so he can learn how to deactivate the powered exosuits storming the city, but is soon discovered by the enemy.

episodes.title: Confidence is a plant of slow growth
episodes.plot: To protect Stern Bild and its people, the heroes have accepted Jake's challenge to a one-on-one death match.

episodes.title: Love is blind
episodes.plot: Ten months have passed since the epic battle between the heroes and the terrorist Jake Martinez. Tiger and Barnaby, now hailed as the heroes who saved Stern Bild, find their lives occupied with interviews and other media events, one of which is forming a special idol unit with Blue Rose.

episodes.title: The sky's the limit...
episodes.plot: Sky High falls in love with a woman he met at a park.

episodes.title: Truth Lies at the Bottom of a Well
episodes.plot: Ben informs Kotetsu of a possible explanation behind the hero's recent boost in powers, a fact that does not please Kotetsu.

episodes.title: Blood Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.plot: Troubled by the recent events, Kotetsu decides to take a vacation and visit his hometown.

episodes.title: Ignorance is bliss
episodes.plot: Kotetsu tries to tell Barnaby of his decision to retire from the hero business, only to be interrupted by the news of Kriem awakening from her coma.

episodes.title: There's no way out
episodes.plot: Barnaby grows unstable as his memories of his parents' murderer continue to fluctuate.

episodes.title: Full of courtesy, full of craft
episodes.plot: Samantha, having brought the new information she uncovered, asks to see Barnaby.

episodes.title: Heaven helps those who help themselves
episodes.plot: Kotetsu finds himself wanted for a crime he didn't commit.

episodes.title: Bad Luck Often Brings Good Luck
episodes.plot: Kotetsu comes up with an idea to clear his name.

episodes.title: Misfortunes never come singly
episodes.plot: Kotetsu is finally reunited with Barnaby.

episodes.title: Nothing ventured, nothing gained
episodes.plot: Kotetsu and Barnaby go up against H-01.

episodes.title: Eternal immortality
episodes.plot: The heroes suffer a great loss.
